QuestData.Title: The Sole Mender
QuestData.Description:
When we join Ohn'ahra in the wind, we leave these medallions behind.
Although I helped craft this medallion, I am not its rightful owner.
It should be returned to Roscha. It is the last memory of her betrothed.
Take it to her so she may mourn and be at peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Medallion to Farrier Roscha.
QuestData.RewardText:
Is this... ah. It is. My beloved is in the sky, then, running with Ohn'ahra. I will join her... in time.
Thank you, $p.
I will remember what you have done for Clan Shikaar. And for me.
